mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.process_route_sid, t.process_route_code, t.process_route_name, t.process_route_category, t.effective_date, t.useable_type, t.company_sid, t.remark, t.status, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t1.company_name, t2.nick_name as updater_account_name, t3.nick_name as creator_account_name, t4.nick_name as confirmer_account_name, t.plant_sid, t.plant_code, t6.plant_name, t6.short_name as plant_short_name, t.customer_sid, t.customer_code, t5.customer_name from s_man_process_route t left join s_bas_company t1 on t1.company_sid = t.company_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t2.user_name = t.updater_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t3.user_name = t.creator_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t4.user_name = t.confirmer_account left join s_bas_customer t5 on t5.customer_sid=t.customer_sid left join s_bas_plant t6 on t6.plant_sid = t.plant_sid
mapper.select: select t.process_sid, t.process_name, t3.plan_end_date from s_man_process_route_item t left join ( select t2.process_sid, t2.plan_end_date from s_man_manufacture_order_process t2 where t2.manufacture_order_sid=#{manufactureOrderSid} and t2.work_center_sid=#{workCenterSid} ) t3 on t3.process_sid=t.process_sid where t.process_route_sid = #{processRouteSid} order by t.serial_num asc
